action.action-desc: Mrs. Napolitano (for herself, Ms. Gabbard, Ms. Hanabusa, Mr. Cartwright, Mr. Costa, Mr. Huffman, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. Cárdenas, Mr. Ruiz, Mr. Sires, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Ben Ray Luján of New Mexico, Ms. Lofgren, Mr. Larson of Connecticut, Ms. Hahn, Mr. Pastor of Arizona, Mr. Doggett, and Mr. Takano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize and update certain provisions of the Secure Water Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SECURE Water Amendments Act.

section.header: Authorized activities; eligibility; authorization of appropriations

subsection.text: Section 9504 of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (42 U.S.C. 10364) is amended—

clause.text: in clause (i), by striking or at the end;
in clause (ii), by striking the period and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:
to plan for or address the impacts of drought.
by striking ; and and inserting ; or;
by striking (A) be located within the States and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: in subsection (e), by striking There is and all that follows through $200,000,000 and inserting There are authorized to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out this section for each of fiscal years 2015 through 2023.

section.header: Authorization of appropriations for national water availability and use assessment program
section.text: Section 9508(e)(2) of the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 (42 U.S.C. 10368(e)(2)) is amended by striking $12,500,000 for the period of fiscal years 2009 through 2013 and inserting such sums as are necessary for the period of fiscal years 2014 through 2023.
